title: what champions are the best at cuddling?
body:
iv thought about this for about 30 seconds maybe and so far id have to say the top 10 best cuddlers in no specific order are

{{champion:40}} will never get too warm or cold cus her wind powers, basically the cold side of the pillow whenever you want.
{{champion:201}} big, strong, will motivate you. ok with always being big spoon.
{{champion:37}} knows the best music, calming presence. built in pillows.
{{champion:16}} knows the most relaxing position by default, prob makes the best hot coco you will ever have. 
{{champion:44}} wise beyond his years, knows how to massage. ok with being big or little spoon.
{{champion:98}} basically just taric.
{{champion:350}} literally a cat.
{{champion:518}} idk how that shoma stuff works but its prob nice to share, can literally shape shift, wants to know about ur day.
{{champion:89}} radiates a calming warmness, makes you feel always protected. big spoon champion.
{{champion:103}} fluffy tails.

thank you for coming to my ted talk.

replies.body: {{champion:79}} His body is thicc af, making it perfect for cuddling

ahri would probably have shit stains on those tails. If you've ever had a cat they get little poopsies on their big floof after taking shits. Just saying I don't wanna cuddle with a tail that has feces residue and her humanoid figure would not hide her actual wild nature that would result in her being oblivious to her poopshit tails

We can all take this time to appreciate a real god of cuddles and that is {{champion:27}} CAN LITERALLY LIFT ANYONE, imagine those big strong arms carressimg you. do you miss being a child and having your parents cradling you? well this man is capable of just that. His slender body is also kawaii little spoon material. His bald head means No hair getting in ur fucking mouth or eyes so he never has to adjust his hair while cuddling you or while you cuddle him. It's fitting he's the best cuddler and that's why we chase him so hard, he let's out an aroma that brings all those around him comfort. 
He provides the happiness we seek in this dire world.

Given the very nature of Ahri, I'd  say she gonna take care of her body - and tails - better than that.

*****Finds a pond or slow-flowing river and just dives in.*****

https://static.invenglobal.com/upload/image/2017/11/15/i1510797876775754.jpeg

Or just borrows the bath house of the poor soul she's just *****cough***** done in.

I guess it wouldn't really matter if she did or not with her charm

She does possess a human-ish mindset so staying clean is probably high on her list of priorities.

That and she can probably scrub herself using her own fire making it easy.

If it wasn't limited to champions, the poros would take first place. 

Although Nunu & Willump is probably a good 2 for 1 package

Neeko is only good to cuddle if youre lean and feminine and smell nice. 

But then shes also on you like white on rice so its worth it
{{champion:33}} if you're a masochist.

I'd say Ahri's fluffy tails

What? No love for {{champion:76}} ? Yeesh.

10/10 would cuddle with volibear. or rengar... or warwick... or willump,, and alistar, gnar, teemo, heimer, kennen, veigar. basically anyone who has fur.

out of all of those, i’d probably pick veigar or teemo because they’re both hella cute. but veigar is supposedly “evil” so probably teemo if we’re talking about the basic “hug” cuddling, where the two face each other and one wraps their arms around the other

but spooning, however, i would pick volibear, rengar, alistar or warwick. any of the big fluffy guys. probably warwick though cuz he’s my favorite

zac would be like laying in jello lmao

{{champion:267}} - Fluffy tail is nice, but what about scaly and slippery?   (ღ˘⌣˘ღ)

Yodels seem to have fur, females just a thinner smoother layer, so that'd be pleasant, similar sensation to cuddling w/ a groomed pet + benefits of actually being a person.

{{champion:203}} Same logic w/ Lamb.  Not sure what sensation wolf would give.
